snippet: Fab Melo will not play in the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament, decreasing the top-seeded Orange’s chances of playing for the national title.
abstract: Syracuse announces that center Fab Melo will not play in the NCAA men's basketball tournament, a move that decreases the top-seeded team’s chances of playing for the national title; university cites an 'eligibility issue' as the reason, but declines further comment.
lead_paragraph: Fab Melo will not play in the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament, decreasing the top-seeded Orange’s chances of playing for the national title.

headline.seo: Syracuse’s Shot-Blocking Center Is Ineligible for Tournament
headline.main: Top-Seeded Orange Lose Key Player on Defense
headline.print_headline: Top-Seeded Orange Lose Key Player On Defense
